title: International Scholarship
description: Awarded a scholarship for a 3-month study exchange program in Canada, gaining valuable international exposure and academic experience.

title: Crowdfunding Leadership
description: Spearheaded a successful crowdfunding initiative to raise funds for animal shelter Finca Arkadia, surpassing the initial fundraising goal 2.3 times.

title: Academic recognition
description: Received an Honorable Mention for my Web and Multimedia final project. In addition, honored with the Extraordinary Prize for Professional Artistic Education in Plastic Arts and Design.
